bibl.title: A Ptolemaic Head of Isis.
bibl.note: Ann Arbor, Mich., Kelsey Museum, Inv. 71.2.224. Marble head, related both to the worship of Isis and to the ruler cult, 2nd half of the 2nd cent. B.C. - Non vidimus. Cf. APh 61 (1992) No. 6480.
bibl.seg: Visonà Paolo, A Ptolemaic Head of Isis.
Ann Arbor, Mich., Kelsey Museum, Inv. 71.2.224. Marble head, related both to the worship of Isis and to the ruler cult, 2nd half of the 2nd cent. B.C. - Non vidimus. Cf. APh 61 (1992) No. 6480.
